entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shared framework ships runtimeconfig.json with unwanted policy settings #32969
  • [8.0.100-preview.5.23276.4]Unable to cast object of type when passing data(custom type) to a component in Blazor Apps after building #32967
  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc]With .NET8 preview 5 installed on Loc OS, the options for artifacts-path are unlocalized after running "dotnet build --help" in CLI . #32955
    8.0.1xx

Closed

  • Workload experience for out-of-tree workloads poor, especially on upgrades #30661
  • OutputPath contains double path separator leading to NU5019 in nuget pack #32971
  • `Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.Sdk` is not working outside of Windows (but it can) #32891
  • Unnecessary ApiCompat CP0001 errors when type forwards used #31271
    Backlog
  • [Package Validation] Baseline package validation should run with references #18676
    Backlog
  • ApiCompat flags introduction of a base exception type for exceptions previously inheriting from System.Exception #32922

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable error when using BinaryFormatter in GenerateResource #32981
    untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2192613 #32979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32975
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add warning about version/distro-specific RID assets in .NET 8+ #32970
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • add review comment to sb files #32966
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Validate suppressions #32964
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Enable interceptors compiler feature when RDG is enabled #32950
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • [release/7.0.4xx] excluded containerize from source-build #32895
    Area-Containers
  • Explicitly enable BF for WinForms and WPF in Microsoft.NET.Sdk.targets #32952
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK, .NET 8.0
  • [APICompat - PackageValidation] Enable baseline assembly references #32930
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Improve errors about unsupported aot scenarios #32943
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • ApiCompat log breaking changes footer as error #32956
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • [wasm] Override versions of previous runtime packs #32882
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 8.0.1xx
  • Update the rid to the latest #32883
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
